description: This file defines React context and provider components for managing user authentication state using Supabase, including sign-in, sign-up, sign-out, password reset, session management, and role-based authorization.

methods.name: AuthProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component that provides authentication context to its children, managing session state and user actions.

methods.name: signIn
methods.description: Asynchronous function that signs in a user with email and password, updates session state, and provides user feedback.

methods.name: signUp
methods.description: Asynchronous function that registers a new user with email and password, initiates email verification flow, and updates state.

methods.name: requestPasswordReset
methods.description: Sends a password reset email to the specified address and provides user feedback.

methods.name: refreshSession
methods.description: Refreshes the current user session from Supabase and updates local state.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Signs out the current user, clears session and user data, and notifies the user.

methods.name: useAuth()
methods.description: Custom React hook to access the authentication context.
